entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
